layout.description: Describes the entire layout for the page or component

content.description: An entire dataset of IDs to content that should be displayed in the layout

^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.description: Text, media URL, or SVG string to display in HTML layout

interactions.description: An entire dataset of IDs to Javascript code that should be added to an element's domProps event callbacks

^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.description: Text, media URL, or SVG string to display in HTML layout

type.description: Name of the Element template or HTML tag name

props.description: Custom template properties to pass to the element. This should be an ID wrapped in `{{}}` from the `content` dataset

domProps.description: DOM properties and values for the element including any javascript interactions. Javascript should be an ID wrapped in `{{}}` from the `interactions` dataset
